level.heading: INTAKE FOR TEMPORARY SHELTER FOR INDIVIDUAL ADULTS (ยง 29-2505) Intake for temporary shelter for individual adults shall consist of anligibility determination and placement in a shelter. An individual adult applicant shall apply directly to and be determinedligible for temporary shelter by the Provider from whom the individual iseeking services.
SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 470, 477 (January 24, 1992); asmended by Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 6438July 23, 2010) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice Emergency Rulemaking publishedt 57 DCR 11353 (November 26, 2010) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergencyulemaking published at 58 DCR 3007 (April 8, 2011) [EXPIRED]; as amended byotice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 7442, 7445 (August 19, 2011).
